== About ==

Hi there! I'm Thanos Lefteris, I currently live in Athens, Greece. I have been trying various GNU/Linux distros from as back as 1999. In 2003 Debian became my testing desktop and in 2006 the wonderful Ubuntu Dapper became my primary desktop and I have been using Ubuntu since then.

== Where to find me ==

Website: http://thanoslefteris.com

Launchpad Profile: http://launchpad.net/~alefteris

== Contributions ==

* Have been translating Ubuntu and GNOME in Greek
* Have been taking care of the Greek LoCo Team website
* Occasional bug reporting and triaging
* Promoting Ubuntu at family, friends and work
